summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4530 for the improvement of East 37th Street from Union Bay Place to 42nd Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53080, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
